palette-description: A Cool & Industrial palette designed for high-end fitness studios. It balances heavy architectural tones with high-visibility accents to drive action and energy. Best suited for gyms, hardware brands, and tech-focused athletic performance companies.
color-description: Primary dark grounding color for text and deep UI regions.
step-description: Lightest tint for soft dark regions.
